articles.title: China gets closer to space goals but threat to US ‘more of a theory’ - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Country has made rapid technological advances and this week sent a crew of astronauts to its first space station, but it still lags behind powers like America and analyst says it may take years to catch up.

articles.title: America's Cup: Valencia confirms hosting bid with $29b fund to dip into - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Cup history, sustainability and technology at heart of bold bid that city believes can to help boost Spain's recovery.
articles.content:
Valencia has confirmed its bid to host the next Americas Cup and has a treasure chest full of money to dip into.

articles.title: EU Lifts Ban On American Travelers - NPR
articles.description: The European Union has recommended that Americans be allowed to travel freely throughout the bloc. But each member country sets its own rules for entry.
